mapper.select: SELECT no, item_no, item, price, member_id, name, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM order_list

SELECT no, item_no, item, price, member_id, name, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM order_list WHERE 1=1 AND reg_day >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND reg_day < to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + interval '1 day'
AND item LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%'
AND name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
